mapper.select: select sd.sdoc_num,dt.doc_name,sd.sdoc_title,emp.emp_name,sd.emp_num,sd.sdoc_date,dp.dept_name from sign_doc sd,employee emp,doc_type dt,dept dp where sd.emp_num=emp.emp_num and sd.doc_num=dt.doc_num and dp.dept_num=emp.dept_num and sd.emp_num=#{emp_num} and sd.sdoc_state=0
select * from(select emp.emp_num,emp.emp_name,dp.dept_num,dp.dept_name,emp.pst_num,pst.pst_name from dept dp,employee emp,position pst where dp.dept_num=emp.dept_num and emp.pst_num=pst.pst_num)
select * from sdoc_line where emp_num=#{emp_num} and sline_state=0

select sd.sdoc_num,dt.doc_name,sd.sdoc_title,emp.emp_name,sd.emp_num,sd.sdoc_date,dp.dept_name from sign_doc sd,employee emp,doc_type dt,dept dp where sd.emp_num=emp.emp_num and sd.doc_num=dt.doc_num and dp.dept_num=emp.dept_num and sd.sdoc_num=#{sdoc_num} and sd.sdoc_state=0
select emp_name,pst_name from employee emp,position pst where emp.pst_num=pst.pst_num and emp.emp_num=#{emp_num}
